Element_Description: Explains what clinical trials are (testing new treatments/research)
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if response defines clinical trials; 0 if omitted or unclear

Element_Description: Mentions purpose is to find better treatments or advance medical knowledge
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if research aims are stated; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Explains potential benefits (access to new therapies)
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if mentions access to novel treatments; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if voluntary nature explicitly stated; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Mentions that participation helps advance medical science
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if altruistic/societal benefit noted; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if age criteria discussed; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if diagnosis confirmation mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if health/functional status discussed; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if previous treatments mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if medical history factors noted; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Notes that specific criteria vary by individual study
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if acknowledges trial-specific variation; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if screening process described; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if ongoing visits mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if lab testing discussed; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if imaging procedures mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if treatment delivery described; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if visit frequency indicated; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if adverse effects discussed; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if uncertainty explicitly noted; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if potential benefits stated; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if lack of guaranteed benefit noted; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if monitoring process explained; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Right to withdraw at any time mentioned
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if withdrawal rights stated; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if duration variability noted; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if visit frequency discussed; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if appointment duration mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if post-treatment follow-up noted; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Time commitment varies by study phase
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if phase-based variation mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if long-term follow-up discussed; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Research costs typically covered by sponsor
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if sponsor payment mentioned; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Standard medical care costs may apply
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if patient cost responsibility noted; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if travel logistics mentioned; 0 if omitted
Score 1 if trial registry referenced; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Contact research team for enrollment information
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if contact process described; 0 if omitted

Element_Description: Recommendation to discuss with healthcare provider
Scoring_Guide: Score 1 if provider consultation encouraged; 0 if omitted
